title: GET_RESOURCE_KVP_INT
content:
0x557B586A// GetResourceKvpInt
int GET_RESOURCE_KVP_INT(char* key);Parameters:key: The key to fetchReturns: The integer value stored under the specified key, or 0 if not found.A getter for SET_RESOURCE_KVP_INT.Examples:Lualocal kvpValue = GetResourceKvpInt('bananabread') 
if kvpValue ~= 0 then
	-- do something!
end
codeBlocks:
local kvpValue = GetResourceKvpInt('bananabread') 
if kvpValue ~= 0 then
	-- do something!
end
